text: Sujanpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) (Sl. No.: 1) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Pathankot district, Punjab state, India. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 1951: Pratap Singh, Indian National Congress * 1977: Chaman Lal, Indian National Congress * 1980: Chaman Lal, Indian National Congress * 1985: Raghunath Sahai Puri, Indian National Congress * 1992: Raghunath Sahai Puri, Indian National Congress * 1997: Satpal Saini, Bharatiya Janata Party * 2002: Raghunath Sahai Puri, Indian National Congress * 2007: Dinesh Singh Babbu, Bharatiya Janata Party * 2012: Dinesh Singh Babbu, Bharatiya Janata Party * 2017: Dinesh Singh Babbu, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== ==2017== {{cite web |url=https://www.ndtv.com/elections/punjab/sujanpur-mla-results ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Pathankot district
title: Sujanpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
